message: a useful python library for console coloring http://pypi.python.org/pypi/python-termstyle

I'll take a stab at porting my current colorizing approach to use python-termstyle when i have some time.  would you like a pull request on github with the current approach in the meantime?  i do make sure not to colorize anything if stdout isn't a TTY
yes, please send a pull request
